title: Zyra: Stomp the plant bud and take spell damage or dodge the spell and take plant damage
body: That's the kind of interactive, mechanic based gameplay I play League for

replies.body: *At level 3: Don't have enough Movement Speed to stomp the bud. Take spell damage and plant damage.

Hi, Zyra supp main here. The best time to step on the plants is after she has used her E (Grasping Roots). You can step on the buds, and even get some hits on her because without that E she is literally powerless to stop you. Her new Q has a narrow hitbox, so moving up or down can really throw even a good Zyra off her game. Lastly, the plants die very quickly. Sometimes it's best to cut your losses and retreat for a better opportunity.

Remember, Zyra is the squishiest and slowest champion in the game! Wait for her to E, then all in her and enjoy her death.

Leona also works. She either saves her spells to poke, or saves for defense. If she goes agro, you can often catch her with a Zenith Blade and unable to drop plants to trade. If you can force her to save her spells to be defensive, you have effectively removed her usefullness in lane. 
Your adc will also enjoy actually having health.
Her cooldowns are her weakness early on. Either she uses them and is defenseless, or she saves them and isn't harassing you.
